title: Savvy PR Campaign Has Lured Many To Fight In Syria's Civil War
teaser: More than 500 people may have traveled from the U.K. to Syria to fight in its civil war. Arun Rath talks to Jessica Stern, author of Terror In The Name Of God, about how it's drawing Westerners.
